Watch

Another cruise ends badly

For the second time this year, a fire at sea has aborted a cruise ship's voyage. The Royal Caribbean Grandeur of the Seas' 2,200 passengers are returning to Baltimore after being flown on charter flights from the Bahamas. Royal Caribbean said all guests and 796 crew were safe.

News

Senator McCain makes trip to Syria

The Arizona Republican, a proponent of arming Syrian rebels, quietly slipped into Syria for a meeting with anti-government fighters. McCain has voiced support for sanctions against anyone who sells oil or transfers arms to Assad's regime.
